data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Monné, Miguel A. (2014): Paracriodion Fragoso (Coleoptera: Cerambycidae: Cerambycinae): redefinition, with description of a new species from Bolivia. Zootaxa 3847 (1): 139-144, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.3847.1.9
